author: UltPanda
name: Cautions
short: Enhanced moderation system with point-based warnings
description: An advanced moderation system featuring configurable warning points, automatic escalating actions, timed mutes, and detailed logging. Warnings expire automatically and thresholds can trigger mutes, timeouts, kicks, or bans.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Cautions cog! Use `[p]help Cautions` to see all commands. Start with `[p]cautionset` to configure settings and `[p]setupmute` to create the mute role.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data about warnings given to users, including the reason, points, moderator, and timestamp. It also tracks mute durations and action thresholds that have been applied.
